content: Newton's laws of motion describe the relationship between a physical object and the forces acting upon it.
The Pythagorean theorem states that in a right triangle, the square of the hypotenuse equals the sum of the squares of the other two sides.
Water is composed of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom, with the chemical formula H2O.
DNA is a molecule that carries genetic instructions for the development, functioning, growth and reproduction of all known organisms.
Machine learning is a method of data analysis that automates analytical model building.
